comment: Contains/references the steps required to undeploy all artifacts created by users as part of the labs, the artifacts required by the labs and the Client Onboarding scenario itself

CONTAINER.comment: Clean up artifacts created by users when performing labs and artifacts created initially for labs
CONTAINER.description: Remove Client Onboarding Lab User Data and Lab Artifacts

INCLUDE.comment: Delete custom user artifacts created in the environment as part of labs
Delete artifacts created for labs in the environment
Clean up Client Onboarding scenario related artifacts in reverse order
